functions.name: create_key
functions.description: Request creation of a new FMU Gateway API key for the current user.

functions.name: upload_fmu
functions.description: Upload an FMU to the gateway, providing either a filesystem path or base64-encoded content.

file.description: Path to the FMU on disk or base64-encoded FMU payload.

functions.name: library_query
functions.description: Search the FMU library for available models matching the provided query string.

query.description: Search phrase used to filter FMUs in the gateway library.

functions.name: simulate
functions.description: Execute an FMU simulation job on the FMU Gateway.

fmu_id.description: Identifier of the FMU previously uploaded to the gateway.

start_values.description: Map of variable names to override their initial values.

input_signals.description: Signal definitions provided to the simulation as inputs.

times.description: Time vector for the signal in seconds.

values.description: Values corresponding to each time step.

kpis.description: List of KPI identifiers requested from the simulation results.
